description: Wondering how to cook Brussels sprouts? Try them roasted, then stirred through pasta with chilli, garlic and parmesan. The family will love it.
name: Roasted Brussels Sprouts Pasta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare salad according to packet instructions. Top pasta with parsley and parmesan, then serve with salad.
